Label.en: Because of all this, the government decided to move the graveyard, and the bodies, out of the city in 1787
Label.fr: A cause de tout ceci, le gouvernement a décidé de déménager le cimetière et les corps en 1787
Label.es: Because of all this, the government decided to move the graveyard, and the bodies, out of the city in 1787
Label.zh: Because of all this, the government decided to move the graveyard, and the bodies, out of the city in 1787

Label.en: To fill the space, they moved this fountain here!
Label.fr: Et ils y ont déplacé une fontaine pour marquer l'endroit!
Label.es: To fill the space, they moved this fountain here!
Label.zh: To fill the space, they moved this fountain here!

Label.en: It's now a popular square for relaxing, with many shops and attractions around
Label.fr: C'est maintenant une place populaire pour se détendre, entourée de nombreuses boutiques
Label.es: It's now a popular square for relaxing, with many shops and attractions around
Label.zh: It's now a popular square for relaxing, with many shops and attractions around

Label.en: Now, I have a couple of cool anecdotes about the place, want to hear?
Label.fr: J'ai quelques anecdotes sur cet endroit, cela t'intéresse ?
Label.es: Now, I have a couple of cool anecdotes about the place, want to hear?
Label.zh: Now, I have a couple of cool anecdotes about the place, want to hear?

Label.en: So, because the area was so famous for being horrible, it has been popular in fiction!
Label.fr: Etant donné que l'endroit avec la réputation d'ête horrible, il a été popularité dans les fictions!
Label.es: So, because the area was so famous for being horrible, it has been popular in fiction!
Label.zh: So, because the area was so famous for being horrible, it has been popular in fiction!

Label.en: In particular, the home of several groups of vampires...
Label.fr: En particulier, comme base de plusieurs groupes de vampires..
Label.es: In particular, the home of several groups of vampires...
Label.zh: In particular, the home of several groups of vampires...

Label.en: And the birthplace of the villain with smelling superpowers in 'Perfume' by Patrick Suskind
Label.fr: Et lieu de naissance d'un méchant avec de super-pouvoirs offalctifs dans 'Parfum' de Patrick Suskind
Label.es: And the birthplace of the villain with smelling superpowers in 'Perfume' by Patrick Suskind
Label.zh: And the birthplace of the villain with smelling superpowers in 'Perfume' by Patrick Suskind
